definition: (bird species of China) chukar partridge (Alectoris chukar)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(bird species of China) rusty-necklaced partridge (Alectoris magna)

sentences.english: Dr. Tobalske working with a chukar at the field station.
sentences.chinese: 託巴爾斯克博士正在野外觀測站觀察一隻石雞。

sentences.english: The genetic distance between Alectoris magna and Alectoris chukar is 5.
sentences.chinese: 大石雞和石雞的遺傳距離爲5。
